name: AWVAnnualWellnessVisit
title: AWV Annual Wellness Visit
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for the AWV Annual Wellness Visit.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute the AWV Annual Wellness Visit for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: All HCPCS codes that constitute the AWV Annual Wellness Visit care need for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: All HCPCS codes that constitute the AWV Annual Wellness Visit care need for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

concept.display: Initial preventive physical examination; face-to-face visit, services limited to new beneficiary during the first 12 months of medicare enrollment
